block.text: 2 THESSALONIANS

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 THESSALONIANS 1
Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ:

block.text: Mipela Pol na Sailas na Timoti, mipela i raitim dispela pas i go long yupela ol manmeri bilong sios i stap long taun Tesalonaika, yupela ol manmeri i pas wantaim God, Papa bilong yumi, na wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: God, Papa bilong yumi, wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais i ken marimari long yupela na mekim yupela i stap bel isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers, even as it is appropriate, because your faith grows exceedingly, and the love of each and every one of you towards one another abounds.

block.text: Ol brata, olgeta taim mipela i save tingting long yupela na tenkyu long God. I gutpela tru long mipela i mas mekim olsem, long wanem, bilip bilong yupela i kamap strong tru, na yupela olgeta wan wan i save givim bel bilong yupela long ol arapela, na dispela pasin i kamap moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore we ourselves boast about you in the assemblies of God. We boast of your patience and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which you endure.

block.text: Long dispela as tasol, taim mipela i go nabaut long ol sios bilong God, mipela i save litimapim nem bilong yupela. Mipela i save tokim ol long olgeta pasin nogut ol birua i mekim long yupela, na long olgeta hevi i bin kamap long yupela. Na mipela i save tok olsem, "Ol Tesalonaika i save sanap strong na holimpas bilip bilong ol na karim olgeta dispela hevi na pen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is an obvious sign of the righteous judgment of God, to the end that you may be counted worthy of the Kingdom of God, for which you also suffer.

block.text: Long ol dispela samting i kamap long yupela, God i soim yumi olsem, em i mekim stretpela pasin tasol na em i skelim pasin bilong yumi. Yupela i karim pen, long wanem, yupela i laik kirapim kingdom bilong God, na God bai i mekim yupela inap tru long i stap insait long kingdom bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Since it is a righteous thing with God to repay affliction to those who afflict you,

block.text: God bai i mekim stretpela pasin olsem. Em bai i bekim hevi long ol man i save givim hevi long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and to give relief to you who are afflicted with us. This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels in flaming fire:

block.text: Na em bai i pinisim dispela hevi nau yupela i karim, na givim malolo long yupela na long mipela wantaim. God bai i mekim olsem long taim Bikpela Jisas wantaim olgeta strongpela ensel bilong en i lusim heven na i kamap ples klia. Em bai i kam long bikpela paia tru

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will give vengeance to those who don’t know God, and to those who don’t obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus Christ,

block.text: na em bai i mekim save long ol man i no laik save long God na i no bihainim gutnius bilong Jisas, Bikpela bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will pay the penalty: eternal destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might.

block.text: Ol dispela man bai i kisim pe nogut olsem. Ol bai i stap longwe long Bikpela na long lait bilong bikpela strong bilong em, na ol bai i bagarap i stap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he comes, his glory will be seen in his saints. He will receive honor from all those who put their trust in him. This includes you because you believed our testimony to you.

block.text: Long dispela De God i makim, Bikpela bai i kam na mekim save long ol, tasol olgeta manmeri bilong God, em olgeta manmeri i bin bilip long em, ol bai i litimapim nem bilong em na amamas tru long em. Na yupela tu bai i amamas wantaim ol, long wanem, yupela i bin bilip tru long tok bilong God mipela i bin autim namel long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To this end we also pray always for you, that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and work of faith, with power.

block.text: Mipela i ting long ol dispela samting i laik kamap, na olgeta taim mipela i save prea long God bilong yumi na askim em long helpim yupela. Mipela i laik bai em i ken mekim yupela inap tru long mekim ol pasin em i bin singautim yupela long mekim. Mipela i save prea long em i ken givim strong long yupela, na yupela i ken mekim olgeta gutpela pasin yupela i laik mekim na bilip bilong yupela i kirapim yupela long mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In this way, the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and you in him. Aaccording to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Na long dispela pasin yupela i ken litimapim nem bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas, na em i ken litimapim nem bilong yupela tu. God bilong yumi na Bikpela Jisas Krais i ken marimari long yupela na mekim ol dispela samting i kamap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 THESSALONIANS 2
Now, brothers, concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and our gathering together to him, here is what we ask:

block.text: Ol brata, nau mipela i laik tok long Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais em bai i kam bek gen, na bai yumi bung wantaim em. Mipela i laik bai yupela i putim yau gut long dispela tok bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do not be quickly shaken in your mind, nor yet be troubled, either by spirit, or by word. Nor by letter as from us, saying that the day of Christ had come.

block.text: Ating sampela man i tokim yupela long De bilong Bikpela i kamap pinis. Ating wanpela man i ting Holi Spirit i givim dispela kain tok profet long em, o wanpela man i autim tok bilong God na i mekim dispela tok, o wanpela man i tok mipela i bin raitim pas i gat kain tok olsem i stap long en. Tasol maski yupela i bin harim dispela kain tok long wanem hap, yupela i no ken kirap nogut kwiktaim na pilim hevi long tingting bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let no one deceive you in any way. For it will not be, unless the departure comes first, and the man of sin is revealed. He is the son of destruction.

block.text: Yupela i no ken larim wanpela man i giamanim yupela long tok bilong en o long pasin em i mekim. Harim. Dispela De i no inap kamap nating. Nogat. Pastaim planti man bai i bikhet na givim baksait long God. Na man bilong sakim lo bai i kamap ples klia, em dispela man bilong bagarap long hel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He opposes and exalts himself against all that is called God or that is worshiped; so that he sits as God in the temple of God, setting himself up as God.

block.text: Em bai i birua long olgeta samting ol man i save lotu long en na kolim olsem god bilong ol. Na em bai i hambak na litimapim nem bilong em yet na daunim dispela olgeta samting. Olsem na em bai i sindaun insait long haus bilong God, na em bai i autim tok olsem, "Mi yet mi God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t you remember that, when I was still with you, I told you these things?

block.text: Taim mi stap wantaim yupela mi tokim yupela pinis long dispela samting. Ating yupela i lusim tingting pinis, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now you know what is restraining him, to the end that he may be revealed in his own season.

block.text: Na yupela i save long dispela samting nau i pasim rot bilong dispela man, bilong em i no ken kamap ples klia yet. Em bai i kamap ples klia long taim God i makim bilong em i mas kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the mystery of lawlessness already works. Only there is one who restrains now, until he is taken out of the way.

block.text: Yupela i save, nau dispela pasin bilong sakim lo em i wok hait i stap. Em bai i hait i stap inap long taim dispela man i pasim rot bilong en, em bai i surik i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will kill with the breath of his mouth, and destroy by the manifestation of his coming.

block.text: Na long dispela taim dispela man bilong sakim lo em bai i kamap ples klia. Na Bikpela Jisas bai i kilim em i dai long win bilong maus bilong em yet. Bikpela bai i kamap ples klia wantaim bikpela lait bilong en, na long dispela lait yet em bai i bagarapim tru dispela man bilong sakim lo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The coming of the lawless one will be in accordance with the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders.

block.text: Dispela man bilong sakim lo bai i kamap ples klia long strong bilong Satan tasol. Na long pasin giaman bilong Satan em bai i mekim olgeta kain strongpela wok na ol kain kain giaman mirakel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who are lost in sin will be deceived by the things he can do because they didn’t receive the love of the truth, that they might be saved.

block.text: Na long olgeta giaman bilong pasin nogut em bai i giamanim ol dispela manmeri i wokabaut long rot bilong bagarap. Ol dispela manmeri bai i bagarap, long wanem, taim God i givim tok tru long ol, bai em i ken kisim bek ol, ol i no laikim tru dispela tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because of this, God sends them a working of error, that they should believe a lie.

block.text: Olsem na God i paulim tru tingting bilong ol, bai ol i bilipim tok giaman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will all be judged because they didn’t believe the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.

block.text: Olsem na olgeta man i no bin bilipim tok tru, na ol i bin amamas long mekim pasin nogut tasol, ol bai i kisim pe nogut long kot bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers loved by the Lord, because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief in the truth.

block.text: Tasol ol brata, Bikpela i save laikim yupela tru, na oltaim mipela i pilim olsem mipela i mas tingting long yupela na tenkyu long God long yupela. God i bin makim yupela bilong i stap namel long ol namba wan lain manmeri em i laik kisim bek. Holi Spirit i makim yupela olsem ol gutpela manmeri bilong God yet, na yupela i bilipim tok tru, na long dispela pasin God i kisim bek yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He called you to this through our Good News, for the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Em i laik bai yupela i ken i stap long bikpela lait na strong bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais, olsem na em i singautim yupela pinis long dispela gutnius mipela i bin autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, brothers, stand firm, and hold the traditions which you were taught by us, whether by word, or by letter.

block.text: Olsem na, ol brata, yupela i mas sanap strong. Na olgeta tok bilong God mipela i bin autim long yupela o raitim pas bilong skulim yupela long en, em yupela i mas bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God our Father, who loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope through grace,

block.text: Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais, wantaim God Papa bilong yumi, i laikim yumi tru. Na em i marimari long yumi na i mekim bel bilong yumi i stap gut oltaim oltaim. Na em i helpim yumi long bilip na wetim God i mekim gut tru long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: comfort your hearts and establish you in every good work and word.

block.text: Na em i ken strongim bel bilong yupela, na helpim yupela long bihainim tru olgeta gutpela pasin na long mekim ol gutpela tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 THESSALONIANS 3
Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may spread rapidly and be glorified, even as also with you;

block.text: Ol brata, mipela i gat wanpela tok moa. Em i olsem. Yupela i mas prea long God i ken helpim mipela, na bai tok bilong Bikpela i ken ran i go long olgeta hap na kisim biknem wankain olsem em i bin kisim namel long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and that we may be delivered from unreasonable and evil men; for not all have faith.

block.text: Na yupela i mas prea long God i ken kisim bek mipela long han bilong ol man nogut, em ol man i save mekim pasin nogut. Yupela i save, planti man ol i no bilip long Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you, and guard you from the evil one.

block.text: Tasol Bikpela i save mekim pasin i tru. Olsem na yumi inap long bilip tru long em. Em bai i strongim yupela na lukautim yupela, na Satan bai i no inap mekim wanpela samting long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We have confidence in the Lord concerning you, that you both do and will do the things we command.

block.text: Na Bikpela i mekim mipela i save gut olsem, yupela i mekim olgeta pasin mipela i tok long yupela i mas mekim. Na bihain tu yupela bai i mekim olsem tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: May the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patience of Christ.

block.text: Mipela i laik bai Bikpela i ken stiaim tingting bilong yupela, na bai yupela i ken save tru long pasin bilong God bilong laikim tru ol manmeri, na long pasin bilong Krais bilong sanap strong na karim hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now we command you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ. Withdraw yourselves from every brother who walks in rebellion, and not after the tradition which they received from us.

block.text: Ol brata, long nem bilong Jisas Krais, Bikpela bilong yumi, mipela i tok strong long yupela olsem, sapos sampela brata i save sindaun nating tasol na ol i no bihainim dispela tok mipela i bin givim long ol, orait yupela i mas i stap longwe long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you know how you ought to imitate us. For we didn’t behave ourselves rebelliously among you,

block.text: Yupela i save, yupela i mas bihainim pasin bilong mipela. Taim mipela i stap wantaim yupela, mipela i no save sindaun nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: neither did we eat bread from anyone’s hand without paying for it. In labor and travail we worked night and day, that we might not burden any of you.

block.text: Mipela i no kisim nating sampela kaikai long han bilong yupela. Nogat. Mipela i baim tasol. Mipela i wok strong na mekim planti hatwok moa long san na long nait, bai mipela i no ken putim hevi long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We did this, not because we don’t have the right, but to make ourselves an example to you, that you should imitate us.

block.text: I no olsem mipela i no inap long kisim kaikai samting long yupela. Nogat. Mipela inap tru long kisim, tasol mipela i no kisim, long wanem, mipela i laik soim yupela long gutpela pasin yupela yet i mas bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even when we were with you, we commanded you this: “If anyone will not work, neither let him eat.”

block.text: Yupela i save, taim mipela i stap yet wantaim yupela, mipela i givim tok long yupela olsem, sapos man i no laik mekim wok, orait em i no ken kisim kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we hear of some who walk among you in rebellion, who don’t work at all, but are busybodies.

block.text: Tasol nau mipela i harim tok long sampela bilong yupela ol i sindaun nating tasol. Ol i no mekim wanpela wok. Nogat. Ol i wok long toktok nabaut tasol long olgeta samting bilong ol arapela man, em i no samting bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now those who are that way, we command and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.

block.text: Orait nau long nem bilong Bikpela Jisas Krais mipela i givim strongpela tok long ol dispela man olsem, ol i mas sindaun gut, na ol i mas mekim wok, bai ol i ken lukautim ol yet long kaikai samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you, brothers, don’t be weary in doing well.

block.text: Ol brata, yupela i no ken les long mekim gutpela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man doesn’t obey our word in this letter, note that man, that you have no company with him, to the end that he may be ashamed.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i no bihainim olgeta tok mipela i raitim long dispela pas, orait yupela i mas makim gut dispela man na yupela i mas i stap longwe long em, bai em i ken sem long pasin em i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.

block.text: Mipela i no tok long yupela i mas tingim em i olsem birua bilong yupela. Nogat. Yupela i mas tingim em i brata, na yupela i mas givim tok long em bilong stretim tingting bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

block.text: Bikpela, em i as bilong pasin bilong bel isi, oltaim em i ken mekim yupela i stap bel isi long olgeta samting. Bikpela i ken i stap wantaim yupela olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The greeting of me, Paul, with my own hand, which is the sign in every letter: this is how I write.

block.text: Mi Pol mi yet mi raitim dispela tok gude long yupela. Mi save raitim dispela kain tok long olgeta pas mi raitim. Em i olsem mak bilong ol pas bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.

block.text: Marimari bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais i ken i stap wantaim yupela olgeta.
